wikipedia_page.main: Christopher "Chris" C. Young (24 January 1945 – 19 December 2016) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Hull Kingston Rovers (Heritage No.), as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.

response: Chris or Christopher Young may refer to:
*Christopher Young (producer) (born 1959), Scottish television and film producer
*Christopher Young (rugby league) (1945–2016), British rugby league footballer
**Christopher Young, 71, rugby league player (Hull Kingston Rovers, Great Britain).
*Christopher Young, 71, British rugby league player (Hull Kingston Rovers, Great Britain), complications from cancer and chest infection.
